description.value:
Space Megaphone. A user wearing one may activate it as a Half Action to gain Fear (1) for 1d5 rounds by blasting righteous vitriol, additionally anyone in 5 metres, including the user, must make a +20 Toughness test or be deafened for 1d5 rounds.

Requirements

Often attached to servo-skulls or servitors that can play pre-recorded messages.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
